m_szDocSumamry: New Energy Policies for America Monday, May 17, 2010       Follow @OilVoice Follow @OilVoice   A radical energy bill is on the table in the USA including stronger support for new nuclear generation and moves for a reprocessing research centre. The 987-page Clean Energy Jobs and American Power Act, introduced to the Senate by John Kerry and Joe Lieberman on 12 May, leads with issues of nuclear power under the heading Encouraging Domestic Nuclear Power Generation.
